LanguageData.Manhunters.label: 人狩りの群れ
LanguageData.Manhunters.description: 人を狩ろうとしている動物の群れ
LanguageData.Manhunters.descriptionDialogue: there is a group of {0} manhunting {1} wandering nearby
LanguageData.Manhunters.arrivedLetter: There are manhunting animals in this area.
LanguageData.Outpost.label: 前哨基地
LanguageData.Outpost.description: ちいさな守備されている前哨基地
LanguageData.Outpost.descriptionDialogue: there is an enemy outpost at the site guarded by {0} enemies
LanguageData.Outpost.arrivedLetter: There is an enemy outpost in this area.
LanguageData.Turrets.label: タレット
LanguageData.Turrets.descriptionDialogue: a ring of {0} enemy turrets defends the site
LanguageData.Turrets.arrivedLetter: There are enemy turrets in this area.
LanguageData.AmbushEdge.label: 待ち伏せ
LanguageData.AmbushEdge.descriptionDialogue: 敵の部隊がここに近寄る者を待ち伏せて待っています。
LanguageData.AmbushHidden.label: 待ち伏せ
LanguageData.AmbushHidden.descriptionDialogue: 敵の部隊がここに近寄る者を待ち伏せて待っています。
LanguageData.SleepingMechanoids.label: スリープ状態のメカノイド
LanguageData.SleepingMechanoids.description: 機能休眠中のメカノイドのグループがいます。
LanguageData.SleepingMechanoids.descriptionDialogue: there are {0} sleeping mechanoids in the area
LanguageData.SleepingMechanoids.arrivedLetter: There are a few sleeping hostile mechanoids in this area.\n\nThe mechanoids may or may not wake up when you approach them, so beware.
